description:
After a holiday, cruel reality is the destiny that awaits... Even in another world, that doesn`t change. Mile and the others are worried about Pauline who has suddenly disappeared. Then Mavis receives a letter from home saying that her older brother is getting married, and his bride to be is none other than Pauline!?
In order to settle the debts of Pauline`s past and deal with Mavis` family situation, Mile and the others head to Pauline`s home town!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: No One Mentioned That Pauline`s Getting Married, Did They?!
On n’avait pas dit que Pauline se mariait !
Pauline ga Kekkontte Itte Nai yo ne?!
ポーリンが結婚って言ってないよね?!
